select dept_num from DEPARTMENT where dept_Type=#{dept_Type}
mapper.update: update DEPARTMENT set dept_Type=#{dept_Type} where dept_Num=#{dept_Num}
mapper.select: select name,email,authority,d.dept_type,p.positiontype from mem m inner join depttable d on m.dept_num=d.dept_num inner join position p on m.POSITION_NUM=p.POSITION_NUM

SELECT NAME, email,authority,dept_type,positiontype, rownum r from (select name,email,authority,dept_type,positiontype from mem m, depttable d, position p where m.dept_num=d.dept_num and m.POSITION_NUM=p.POSITION_NUM and dept_type=dept_type) where dept_type=#{dept_Type}

select name,email,authority,dept_type,positiontype from mem m, depttable d, position p where m.dept_num=d.dept_num and m.POSITION_NUM=p.POSITION_NUM and dept_type=dept_type and m.name like '%'|| #{search} || '%'
